00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include "cinder/Cinder.h"
00026 #include "cinder/app/Event.h"
00027 #include "cinder/Filesystem.h"
00028 
00029 #include <vector>
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 namespace cinder { namespace app {
00033 
00035 class FileDropEvent : public Event {
00036   public:
00037     FileDropEvent( int aX, int aY, const std::vector<fs::path> &aFiles )
00038         : Event(), mX( aX ), mY( aY ), mFiles( aFiles )
00039     {}
00040     
00042     int         getX() const { return mX; }
00044     int         getY() const { return mY; }
00046     Vec2i       getPos() const { return Vec2i( mX, mY ); }
00047 
00049     const std::vector<fs::path>&    getFiles() const { return mFiles; }
00051     size_t                          getNumFiles() const { return mFiles.size(); }
00053     const fs::path&                 getFile( size_t index ) const { return mFiles.at(index); }
00054 
00055   private:
00056     int                         mX, mY;
00057     std::vector<fs::path>       mFiles;
00058 };
00059 
00060 } } // namespace cinder::app
